question.para: What is the purpose of JMathLib?

answer.para: JMathLib is designed to be a clone of Matlab or Octave or Scilab or Freemat.
Look at the website or look at the download page.
Just type exity in the command window.
Just download the installer and double-click on the EXE file.
On windows: just double click the program icon

qandadiv.title: Toolboxes
qandadiv.para: These are some answers regarding toolboxes

answer.para: A toolbox is a collection of .m and .class files that work on some specialized area. For example: plot functions are in the graphics toolbox. Functions for reading and writing of data from an the you harddisc are located the io-toolbox.
